name: Turn right - Right turn on tap
name_original: Turn right - Right turn on tap
description:
Tap and hold to take turns!

Play unstoppable minimalistic car racing game. Master the pace and start beating the toughest tracks. Newly created simple yet addictive infinite game designed for stress free causal gamers.

Neat and minimalistic graphics with simplicity and excitement of racing. 5 freshly added racing tracks for challenging driving and super fun. Keep driving and you unlock everything.

3 new cars and drift animations make this simple game more exciting! Don't be bored we are bringing many new challenges. Beat your score and all leaders on leaderboard.
